name: Netflix price data
description: Parsing Netflix price data and loading it into Neo4j using Kettle
environmentHomeFolder: CHANGE TO THE PATH WHERE YOU CHECKED OUT THIS PROJECT

variables.name: NEO4J_HOSTNAME
variables.description: Hostname of the Neo4j demo server

variables.name: NEO4J_BOLT_PORT
variables.description: The Bolt port to connect to (Default: 7687)

variables.name: NEO4J_WEB_PORT
variables.description: The port of the web interface (Default: 7474)
